backend/main.mo: Defines the actor and all core data types for sessions, documents, messages, images, files, and storage integration using mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing enhanced preview markup support and listing affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of autogenerated one‑sentence summaries for numerous frontend source files.
frontend/docs/regression-test-plan-playe: Regression test plan covering player document uploads, privacy behavior, error handling, and preview markup checks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark themes, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that initializes theme mode early and loads the React application root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application logic handling authentication, profile setup, session restoration, routing, UI scaling, and logout behavior.
frontend/src/components/app/AppErrorBoun: React error boundary that displays a fallback UI with error details and options to reload or clear local data.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChannelChat: Chat view handling message input, roll commands, image uploads, auto-scroll, and posting messages to a channel.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatMessage: Renders an individual chat message with avatar, reply preview, long‑press handling, and user profile resolution.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentCom: Displays document comments with add/delete functionality, error handling, and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentCon: Renders document content with inline support for images, attachments, and file lookup using tokenized markup.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentEdi: Full document editor with saving, file uploads, image insertion, preview mode, and unsaved‑change tracking.
frontend/src/components/docs/ImageUpload: Dialog for selecting, validating, and uploading an image with an optional title. Handles file type/size checks, errors, and upload state.
frontend/src/components/docs/PlayerDocum: Editor view for player documents with content editing, saving, visibility control, file uploads, and image insertion. Manages document state, errors, and preview mode.
frontend/src/components/profile/Avatar.t: Displays a user avatar using an image or fallback initials. Handles load errors and supports multiple size options.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: Profile picture management UI allowing upload, validation, progress tracking, and removal. Integrates with user profile hooks and shows current avatar.
frontend/src/components/profile/QuickCha: Dialog for setting a temporary display name and avatar for quick chat. Supports image upload, validation, previews, and clearing the profile.
frontend/src/components/session/ChannelM: Dialogs for creating, renaming, and deleting chat channels. Handles form input, validation, API calls, and success callbacks.
frontend/src/components/session/Document: Provides dialogs for creating, renaming, deleting, and locking documents using actor calls with controlled and internal dialog states.
frontend/src/components/session/HostSess: Implements session export and import UI with file handling, confirmation dialogs, and integration with backend export/import APIs.
frontend/src/components/session/MembersC: Displays dialogs to create, rename, and delete members' channels using mutation hooks and simple form validation.
frontend/src/components/session/PlayerDo: Manages creation, renaming, deletion, and visibility settings for player-owned documents through dialogs and dropdown menus.
Shows a list of a player's documents with create functionality and selection handling, including private document indicators.
frontend/src/components/session/SessionD: Dialog component for listing, creating, renaming, deleting, and selecting session documents.
frontend/src/components/session/SessionS: Sidebar for navigating channels, managing quick profile, UI scale, and collapsing/expanding layout.
frontend/src/components/settings/PreLobb: Settings page allowing theme, background, nickname, and template management before entering a lobby.
frontend/src/components/settings/UIScale: Popover control for adjusting and resetting UI scale preferences.
frontend/src/config/polling.ts: Defines polling interval constants for various frontend data refresh cycles.
Context provider for loading, updating, and resetting user preferences with theme application logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentComments.t: Hooks for fetching, adding, updating, and deleting comments tied to document IDs using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentFiles.ts: Hooks for listing files, retrieving file references, and uploading files associated with documents.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentImages.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing document images and adding images to session or player documents, with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider handling identity loading, login, logout, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerDocuments.ts: Offers hooks for listing, fetching, creating, editing, renaming, deleting, and managing visibility of player documents via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/usePolling.ts: Defines a simple polling hook that repeatedly invokes a callback on a set interval when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreferences.ts: Re‑exports the usePreferences hook from the PreferencesContext.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuickChatProfile.t: Manages loading, saving, and clearing a locally stored quick chat profile with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionData.ts: Fetches session, channels, members’ channels, and messages with polling, plus provides mutations for managing members’ channels.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionDocuments.t: Exposes hooks for listing, retrieving, creating, renaming, editing, and deleting session documents with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserDisplayName.ts: Retrieves a user's display name from their profile or falls back to a shortened principal string.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides hooks for fetching and updating caller and other user profiles, including profile picture removal.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode overrides, and layout/scroll styles for chat and session views.
frontend/src/lib/clearLocalAppData.ts: Clears specific localStorage keys and sessionStorage with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/documentFileMarkers.ts: Creates, parses, inserts, and removes custom [FILE:id:name] markers within text content.
frontend/src/lib/documentImageMarkers.ts: Handles creation, parsing, insertion, and removal of [IMAGE:id:caption] markers.
frontend/src/lib/documentPreviewMarkup.t: Tokenizes content, parses line prefixes, and renders inline markup such as spoilers and underlines in React.
frontend/src/lib/preferencesStorage.ts: Loads, saves, clamps, and resets user UI/theme preferences in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/quickChatProfileStorage: Manages quick chat profile storage with validation for structure, data URL, and size.
frontend/src/lib/rollCommand.ts: Performs basic validation of dice roll command patterns like '2d6+3'.
frontend/src/lib/sessionExportFile.ts: Creates, downloads, and imports JSON session export files with version checks.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStorage.ts: Stores, loads, and clears session context data in localStorage.
Saves, loads, clears, and validates session template data in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into readable time or date strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app root with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and loads global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Provides UI and logic to host or join sessions, manage form state, apply templates, and trigger session join events.
frontend/src/pages/SessionPage.tsx: Handles in-session views including channels, player documents, and session documents, managing selection state and data fetching.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata and feature requests related to adding lightweight markup rendering tools for document previews.
